text: Private Ivan () is a 1955 Soviet comedy movie directed by Ivan Lukinsky.Солдат Иван Бровкин It stars Leonid Kharitonov, Sergey Blinnikov, and Tatyana Pelttser. ==Actors== * Leonid Kharitonov - Ivan Romanovich Brovkin * Sergey Blinnikov - Timothy Kondratievich Koroteev * Tatyana Pelttser - Evdokia Makarovna Brovkina, Ivan's mother * Anna Kolomiytseva - Elizabeth Nikitichna, Koroteev's wife * Daya Smirnova - Lyubasha, daughter of Koroteev == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1955 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Ivan Lukinsky
title: Private Ivan
